title: Admin Registration with Valid Inputs
description: Verify that an admin can register successfully with valid email, password meeting complexity requirements.

steps.description: Navigate to admin registration page.
Enter a valid email address.
Enter a password adhering to password policy.
Submit the registration form.
Verify registration is successful and confirmation message is shown.

title: Admin Registration with Invalid Password
description: Ensure registration fails when the password does not meet complexity requirements.

steps.description: Navigate to admin registration page.
Enter a valid email address.
Enter a password that is too short or missing required character types.
Submit the registration form.
Verify registration fails with appropriate error message.

title: Admin Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check that admin can log in with valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to admin login page.
Enter registered email and corresponding valid password.
Click the login button.
Verify login succeeds and dashboard is displayed.

title: Admin Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Ensure login fails with wrong email or password combination.

steps.description: Navigate to admin login page.
Enter unregistered email or invalid password.
Click the login button.
Verify login is denied with an error message.

title: Admin Password Reset Workflow Valid Email
description: Ensure password reset process works with a registered email.

steps.description: Navigate to admin forgot password page.
Enter a registered admin email address.
Submit the password reset request.
Verify receipt of reset token/link and appropriate confirmation message.

title: Admin Password Reset Workflow Invalid Email
description: Verify system response when resetting password with unregistered email.

steps.description: Navigate to admin forgot password page.
Enter an unregistered email address.
Submit the password reset request.
Confirm that a generic response is shown without revealing user existence.

title: Create New Exam with All Configurable Options
description: Validate that an admin can create an exam specifying pass score, duration, shuffle settings, offline grace period, and access code.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to create exam page.
Fill exam form with valid values for title, pass score, duration, question shuffle, answer shuffle, offline grace period, and access code.
Add multiple-choice questions with options and set correct answers.
Submit the exam creation form.
Verify exam is created successfully and is listed on exam management page.

title: Edit Existing Exam and Validate Changes
description: Check that an admin can edit and save changes to an existing exam's details and questions.

steps.description: Log in as admin and open an existing exam for editing.
Modify exam title, pass score, or shuffle options.
Edit questions or add new questions.
Save changes.
Confirm changes are saved and reflected on exam management page.

title: Clone an Exam and Verify Duplication
description: Ensure that cloning an exam creates a new exam copy with identical data but a unique ID.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to the exam list.
Select an exam to clone and trigger clone operation.
Verify a new exam is created with the same questions and settings but a different identifier.

title: Delete an Exam Successfully
description: Verify that an admin can delete an exam and it is removed from the listing.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to exam management.
Select an exam and delete it.
Confirm exam no longer appears in the exam list and that deletion prompt warns admin.

title: Activate and Deactivate Exam Toggle
description: Check that an admin can toggle the exam’s activation status and that the change affects exam availability for students.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to exam management.
Toggle an exam’s active status off and verify it is inaccessible by students.
Toggle exam active status on and verify students can access it.
Confirm toggle changes persist and reflect correctly in UI and APIs.

title: Student Exam Start with Valid Access Code and Name
description: Verify that students can start an exam by entering required access code and name, and entering fullscreen mode.

steps.description: Access exam link.
Enter a valid student name and required access code.
Agree to exam rules and start exam.
Ensure exam starts, fullscreen is enforced, and timer begins countdown.

title: Reject Exam Start with Incorrect Access Code
description: Ensure the exam cannot start when an invalid access code is provided.

steps.description: Access exam link.
Enter student name and an invalid access code.
Attempt to start exam.
Verify validation failure and error message is displayed without entering exam.

title: Ensure Fullscreen Mode Enforcement During Exam
description: Verify that the student exam interface enforces fullscreen mode and reverts to exam exit warnings if fullscreen is exited.

steps.description: Start an exam in fullscreen mode.
Manually exit fullscreen mode during exam.
Check that warning is displayed and exit count increments.

title: Auto-Submit Exam After Allowed Fullscreen Exits
description: Verify that the exam auto-submits when student exceeds the allowed number of fullscreen exits.

steps.description: Start exam and exit fullscreen repeatedly to reach the maximum allowed exits.
Confirm exam auto-submits and student cannot resume exam.

title: Restrict Copy, Context Menu, and Dev Tools During Exam
description: Validate that copy operation, right-click context menu, and developer tools opening are blocked on the exam page.

steps.description: Start the exam in fullscreen.
Attempt to copy text using keyboard shortcuts.
Right-click to open context menu.
Attempt to open browser developer tools.
Verify all attempts are blocked or disabled with no disruptions to exam flow.

title: Answer Selection and Flagging Functionality
description: Ensure students can select answers, change selections, and flag/unflag questions during the exam.

steps.description: Navigate through exam questions.
Select an answer for a question.
Change the answer selection to another choice.
Flag a question for review.
Unflag the question.
Verify answers save correctly and flagged questions are tracked.

title: Timer Counts Down and Triggers Auto-Submit on Expiry
description: Check timer counts down precisely and automatically submits the exam when time expires.

steps.description: Start an exam with a short configured duration.
Observe timer counting down every second accurately.
Allow timer to reach zero without manual submission.
Confirm exam auto-submits and student sees completion screen.

title: Pause Timer and Resume on Internet Disconnection and Recovery
description: Verify timer pauses when internet connection is lost, shows warning, and resumes if connection returns within grace period.

steps.description: Start an exam and disconnect internet.
Confirm timer pauses and disconnection warning is shown.
Reconnect internet within the grace period.
Verify timer resumes counting down from where it paused.

title: Auto-Submit Exam if Offline Period Exceeds Grace Period
description: Ensure exam auto-submits if student remains disconnected beyond configured offline grace period.

steps.description: Start an exam and disconnect internet.
Verify timer pauses and warning is displayed.
Remain offline longer than grace period.
Confirm exam auto-submits automatically and student is notified.

title: Exam State Recovery After LocalStorage Loss
description: Test that if localStorage is cleared or lost, the exam state is recovered correctly from server via recovery API.

steps.description: Start an exam and answer some questions.
Manually clear browser localStorage related to exam.
Reload the exam page.
Verify exam state including answers, timer, and flags is restored from server.

title: Server-Side Scoring and Answer Validation Accuracy
description: Ensure server correctly calculates scores and validates answers without exposing correct answers on client side.

steps.description: Complete an exam with a mix of correct and incorrect answers.
Submit the exam.
Verify server returns correct total score and result.
Ensure correct answers are not present in client responses or UI.

title: View Detailed Exam Attempts and Analytics in Admin Dashboard
description: Check that admins can view exam statistics including attempt counts, pass rates, average scores, and question performance.

steps.description: Log in as admin and open dashboard for a specific exam.
Verify display of total attempts, pass and fail counts, average scores.
Verify detailed question performance stats and violation logs are present.

title: Delete a Student Attempt from Admin Dashboard
description: Verify admins can delete student attempts and changes reflect on dashboard metrics.

steps.description: Log in as admin and view student attempts list.
Select and delete a specific attempt.
Confirm deletion is successful and attempt is removed from dashboard analytics.

title: Row-Level Security Enforcement on Admin APIs
description: Ensure API endpoints restrict access to data based on admin authentication and data ownership.

steps.description: Attempt to access exam and attempt management APIs without authentication.
Verify access is denied with authentication error.
Login as admin A and attempt to access data belonging to admin B.
Confirm access is denied or no data is returned for unauthorized resources.

title: Responsive UI on Desktop and Major Browsers
description: Verify the application UI renders correctly and is usable on desktop resolutions and supported major browsers.

steps.description: Access the application on latest Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Safari browsers on desktop.
Verify that pages resize correctly, elements align properly, and are accessible.
Test key workflows (admin login, exam creation, exam taking) for UI consistency.

title: Clear and Informative User Feedback on Operations
description: Validate that after successful or failed actions, users receive clear confirmation or error messages.

steps.description: Attempt admin login with incorrect credentials.
Verify clear error message is displayed.
Create an exam and submit successfully.
Confirm success message is shown.
Delete an exam and confirm.
Verify confirmation prompt and success notification after deletion.
